item.title: In need of alot of help....ASAP too o_O
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

Well, i’ve got 2 problems…here they are I guess

  1. When me or anyone else trades the NPCs, it makes them disconnect from the server…Although the only ones that make us disconnect is the ones that I moved to Yanille…

  2. My objects won’t…work. They’ll either duplicate themselves, dissapear, or just plain not work. Someone told me to add NewObjects(); under case 121, and they showed me their code, and I copied it and got errors. I’ve made other objects before and they worked just fine…maybe there’s something wrong with my code? If there is, please tell me, here it is:

     	case 42:    //Fishing
 		addItem(317, 1);
 		sendMessage("You catch a shrimp.");
 		addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[10]), 10);
 		actionTimer = 10;
 		setAnimation(897);
 		updateRequired = true;
 		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
 		break;

And yes, under the NewObjects(); void I have

	makeGlobalObject(2926, 3179, 42, 0, 10);//Fishing Spot

Thank You.

Read full topic
